title: If used responsibly, AI can revolutionise creative industry
description: Actor Abhishek Bachchan shared his views on artificial intelligence at a summit. He believes AI will transform the creative sector. While it offers benefits in animation and special effects, he also expressed apprehension about its potential to affect actors' jobs. Bachchan highlighted that human imperfection is what audiences connect with in films.
content:
